term.title: convenience sample

item.text: A sample chosen on the basis of accessibility, expediency, cost, efficiency or other reason not directly concerned with sampling parameters.

sources.item: PAC, 1990, 62, 1193. 'Nomenclature for sampling in analytical chemistry (Recommendations 1990)' on page 1203 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199062061193)
